resources.string: "Night owl can help you prevent from the harm of strong light at night.\nSome devices\' lowest brightness are still high so we can make it lower by creating a mask on screen."
Enable this can make mask on the top of screen, but it may needs a permission in some devices (Such as MIUI and Android 6.0)\nIf it couldn\'t work, please allow this app to show system alert window.
Failed to start mask. Please check if system has denied the permissions.
Can you see this message? If you can, it proves that Night owl is working well. \nIt will automatically stop after 5 seconds if you didn\t press OK.
